name: Metal Jacket
overview: First person shooter 3d action game in which the player can choose, the combat area, the time of the day, the weather conditions (fog yes or no), the character to play and customize it (body, armor, mobility, damage, radar, color, etc). Different game modes and a link cable mode option for a 2 player matchup. Up to eight different countries to choose, the game also features a story mode.
